Author: hanban97
Text: I don’t eat at work either, I find it really awkward and feel like they’ll all judge me, and I know that if I brought my weird safe foods I’d definitely get comments and stuff. It wouldn’t be worth the anxiety to force myself to eat normal food with them.  I normally drink black coffee so I don’t look completely out of place and if anyone asks, I tell them I prefer to eat at home so I can make a warm meal or that my lunch needed refrigeration so I’ll eat it when I get home or whatever.
